Pitch: Transform your space into a green oasis! Grow flowers, veggies, or herbs—right in your backyard or balcony. Relaxing, rewarding, and eco-friendly!
How to Start: Grab soil, seeds, and a pot. Start with herbs or succulents.
Locations: Emma Prusch Farm Park: 647 S King Rd, San Jose, CA 95116. West Valley College Teaching Garden: 14000 Fruitvale Ave, Saratoga, CA 95070. San Jose State University Garden Club.

Pitch: Capture life’s unforgettable moments! Turn everyday scenes into stunning art with a phone or camera.
How to Start: Start snapping pics with your phone or a beginner camera. Learn lighting and composition.
Locations: San Jose Museum of Art: 110 S Market St, San Jose, CA 95113. Alum Rock Park: 15350 Penitencia Creek Rd, San Jose, CA 95127. De Anza College Photography Club.

Pitch: Find your zen and boost your fitness! Stretch, strengthen, and de-stress with yoga.
How to Start: Roll out a mat and follow online tutorials or join a beginner class.
Locations: Yoga Source: 1963 Pruneridge Ave, Santa Clara, CA 95050. Breathe Los Gatos: 27 University Ave, Los Gatos, CA 95030. Santa Clara University Yoga Club.

Pitch: Become the chef of your own kitchen! Explore new flavors and enjoy healthier, tastier homemade meals.
How to Start: Start with simple recipes like pasta or stir-fry. Experiment with spices and ingredients.
Locations: Sur La Table Cooking Classes: 378 Santana Row, San Jose, CA 95128. Chef’s Kitchen Cooking School: 1580 Oakland Rd, San Jose, CA 95131. Foothill College Culinary Arts Club.

Pitch: Step into nature and leave your stress behind! Explore breathtaking trails, get fresh air, and stay active.
How to Start: Lace up your shoes, grab water, and hit an easy trail.
Locations: Mission Peak Regional Preserve: 43600 Mission Blvd, Fremont, CA 94539. Almaden Quicksilver County Park: 21785 Almaden Rd, San Jose, CA 95120. San Jose State University Outdoor Adventures.
